effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effects.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

moveDescription:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
